item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 1, 2025 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (188 points | 22 comments)
2. Making o1, o3, and Sonnet 3.7 Hallucinate for Everyone (96 points | 79 comments)
3. CoPilot for Everything: Training Your AI Replacement One Keystroke at a Time (87 points | 44 comments)

21. Inheriting is becoming nearly as important as working (508 points | 679 comments)

23. Troubleshooting: A skill that never goes obsolete (342 points | 110 comments)

28. Affixes: The Building Blocks of English (109 points | 14 comments)
29. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (110 points | 154 comments)
